Title: Makes provisions regarding payment by utility customers to authorized payment agents
Summary: Makes provisions regarding the payment of utility bills to authorized payment agencies providing that such payment shall be deemed to be a payment to the utility on the date of payment to the agent, requiring written contracts between a utility and its payment agent and review of such contracts by the public service commission.
LawCode: Amd ยง45, Pub Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public service law, in relation to protecting residential utility customers who make bill payments to authorized payment agents, to provide for written contracts between electric corporations and payment agents, and to provide for public service commission review of the credit-worthiness of payment agents in certain cases
